Headline: No trains between 95th/ Dan Ryan and 87th/Dan Ryan
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between 95th/ Dan Ryan and 87th/Dan Ryan due to a police investigation.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between 95th/ Dan Ryan and 87th/Dan Ryan due to a police investigation.

As a result, trains are operating only between Howard and 87th/Dan Ryan at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between 87th/Dan Ryan and 95th/ Dan Ryan to provide connecting service in both directions.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include #29 State buses.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
